name: $WEN (Stacks)
description: WEN is a meme coin within the Stacks ecosystem, launched in a fair manner through a bonding curve mechanism. It features a cute cat character and develops on-chain tools to support both the Stacks community and its DeFi ecosystem. Additionally, WEN aims to become more than just a meme coin, positioning itself as a cultural hub that drives active on-chain usage within the early-stage Bitcoin DeFi ecosystem and the Stacks community. WEN combines memes that foster community engagement with tools designed to promote on-chain usage.
